21: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> בַּעְשָׁ֔א <sup>1201 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when Baasha</n> וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>[thereof] that he left off</n> מִבְּנ֖וֹת <sup>1129 </sup> <n>building</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽרָמָ֑ה <sup>7414 </sup> <n>of Ramah</n> וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <sup>8656 </sup> <n>in Tirzah</n>
